original_text: Then the leaders of fathers' houses made their freewill offerings, as did also the leaders of the tribes, the commanders of thousands and of hundreds, and the officers over the king's work.
korean_text: 이에 모든 가문의 지도자들과 이스라엘 모든 지파의 지도자들과 천부장과 백부장과 왕의 사무관이 다 즐거이 드리되

sentences.original_text: Then the leaders of fathers' houses made their freewill offerings
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 각 가문의 족장들이 자원하여 예물을 드렸습니다.

sentences.original_text: The leaders of the tribes also gave offerings
The commanders of thousands and of hundreds also gave
and the officers over the king's work also gave
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 왕의 공사를 감독하는 관원들도 드렸습니다.
